channel.title: NomadBSD on LGM
channel.description: Recent content in NomadBSD on LGM

item.title: NomadBSD Installation
item.description: This page was created before 2020 Please refer to the NomadBSD Handbooklet for up to date installation instructions. WiFi FreeBSD / Docs / Wireless Network vim /etc/rc.conf ++ wlans_rtwn0="wlan0" ++ ifconfig_wlan0="WPA DHCP" ++ ifconfig_ale0="DHCP" vim /boot/loader.conf ++ if_rtwn_usb_load="YES" ++ if_rtwn_pci_load="YES" vim /etc/wpa_supplicant.conf ++ network={ ++ ssid="myssid" ++ psk="mypsk" ++ } service netif restart Autostart Programs w/Openbox vim ~/.config/openbox/autostart.sh ++ dsbmc-cli -a & ++ xmodmap ~/.Xmodmap
